page.title: 07Old Town _ Struthers Farm
page.content: A little higher up the hillside ,on your left you will see roofs of another farm,{Old Town,}which is reputed to be built on the site of a Roman fort,as mentioned in {Wallis {Northumberland,1786}but this has never been proved.Look for the stone stiles over the walls en-route making for this farm.Cross over stile near buildings walk with wall on your right on high side of {Struthers Farm.}Just beyond{Struthers,}pass through a gate,cross over a rough track and through a second gate;continue the path due east across two fields,bearing slightly to your right in the second field,until you reach a stone wall.There is a stone stile in this wall which is not easy to find;look for it a little south of a { {pre-fabricated hut. }
